Class ItemArray

java.lang.Object
ItemArray
public class ItemArray extends Object
Class handling array management

Objects are added to the array and can be removed.

    • ItemArray

      public ItemArray()

  • Method Details

    • addObj

      public void addObj(File sprite, String name, String description, int objClass, int modHealth, int modSleep, int modFullness, int modHappiness)
      Adds the required parameters to the array.
      Parameters:
      sprite - the image of the pet
      name - the name of the pet
      description - the description associated with the pet
      objClass - the Pet object
      modHealth - the pet's health level
      modSleep - the pet's sleep level
      modFullness - the pet's fullness level
      modHappiness - the pet's happiness level

    • removeObj

      public void removeObj(String target)
      Removes the specified target from the array.
      Parameters:
      target - which is the required item to remove

    • getItem

      public arrayObject getItem(String target)
      Searches for an item in the array and returns that object.
      Parameters:
      target - which is the required item to locate
      Returns:
      the object if found

    • getSave

      public String getSave()
      Returns a set of lines, each representing an object. every column will represent an attribute of the row object
      Returns:
      the string containing the attributes of the object.

    • loadArray

      public void loadArray(String saved)
      Load the array with objects when the game starts.
      Parameters:
      saved - the string containing the attributes of the pet

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Get amount of objects in inventory.
      Returns:
      the amount of objects found in the inventory.
